mapper.insert: INSERT INTO contestation (typ, date_contestation, date_penalty, id_user, note, description, stop_from, stop_to, file_name,recall, date_bp) VALUES (#{typ}, #{date_contestation}, #{date_penalty}, #{id_user}, #{note}, #{description}, #{stop_from}, #{stop_to}, #{file_name},#{recall},#{date_bp});
mapper.select: SELECT id, typ, date_contestation, date_penalty, note, description, id_user, stop_from, stop_to, file_name, recall, date_bp FROM contestation WHERE id_user = #{id_user} AND YEAR(date_penalty) = #{year} ORDER BY date_contestation DESC;

SELECT id, typ, date_contestation, date_penalty, note, description, id_user, stop_from, stop_to, file_name, recall, date_bp FROM contestation where id_user = #{id_user} and date(date_penalty) = #{date_penalty} order by date_contestation desc;

SELECT id, typ, date_contestation, date_penalty, note, description, id_user, stop_from, stop_to, file_name, recall, date_bp FROM contestation where id_user = #{id_user} order by date_contestation desc;
mapper.update: UPDATE contestation SET typ = #{typ}, date_contestation = #{date_contestation}, date_penalty = #{date_penalty}, id_user = #{id_user}, note = #{note}, description = #{description}, stop_from = #{stop_from}, stop_to = #{stop_to}, file_name = #{file_name}, recall = #{recall}, date_bp = #{date_bp} WHERE id = #{id};
